channel.title: BCD-watch: Changes Report (weekly)
channel.description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Oct 06 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 29 September 2025 through Monday, 6 October 2025ðŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +35, -0

Support increases (35)

API

  1. api âžž SVGAElement âžž download
    Added to Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  2. api âžž SVGScriptElement âžž async
    Added to Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  3. api âžž CSSStyleRule âžž style âžž returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  4. api âžž Document âžž activeViewTransition
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  5. api âžž HTMLElement âžž style âžž returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  6. api âžž MathMLElement âžž style âžž returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  7. api âžž SVGElement âžž style âžž returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  8. api âžž Window âžž getComputedStyle âžž returns_CSSStyleProperties
    Added to Firefox,Safari  âžž  2 of 3 engines

CSS

  1. css âžž at-rules âžž position-try
    Added to Safari  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  2. css âžž properties âžž interest-delay
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  3. css âžž properties âžž interest-delay âžž normal
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  4. css âžž properties âžž interest-delay-end
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  5. css âžž properties âžž interest-delay-end âžž normal
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  6. css âžž properties âžž interest-delay-start
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  7. css âžž properties âžž interest-delay-start âžž normal
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  8. css âžž selectors âžž interest-source
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  9. css âžž selectors âžž interest-target
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  10. css âžž selectors âžž target-after
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  11. css âžž selectors âžž target-before
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html âžž elements âžž iframe âžž cross-origin-top-navigation-by-user-activation
    Added to Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver âžž bidi âžž browsingContext âžž downloadEnd_event
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  2. webdriver âžž bidi âžž browsingContext âžž downloadEnd_event âžž context_parameter
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  7. webdriver âžž bidi âžž browsingContext âžž downloadEnd_event âžž url_parameter
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  8. webdriver âžž bidi âžž browser âžž setDownloadBehavior
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  9. webdriver âžž bidi âžž browser âžž setDownloadBehavior âžž downloadBehavior_parameter
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  10. webdriver âžž bidi âžž browser âžž setDownloadBehavior âžž userContexts_parameter
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  11. webdriver âžž bidi âžž emulation âžž setLocaleOverride âžž locale_parameter âžž sets_navigator_language
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  12. webdriver âžž bidi âžž emulation âžž setUserAgentOverride
    Added to Firefox,Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  13. webdriver âžž bidi âžž emulation âžž setUserAgentOverride âžž contexts_parameter
    Added to Firefox,Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  14. webdriver âžž bidi âžž emulation âžž setUserAgentOverride âžž userAgent_parameter
    Added to Firefox,Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  15. webdriver âžž bidi âžž emulation âžž setUserAgentOverride âžž userContexts_parameter
    Added to Firefox,Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 118

Show all 118 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (48)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 26 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api âžž PerformancePaintTiming âžž first-contentful-paint
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  3 of 3 engines
  2. api âžž PerformancePaintTiming âžž first-paint
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines

    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines

WEBASSEMBLY

  1. webassembly âžž api âžž JSTag_static
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

WEBDRIVER

  1. webdriver âžž bidi âžž bluetooth
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines

  1. webextensions âžž api âžž sidePanel âžž GetPanelOptions

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 26 September 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

API

HTML

  1. html âžž elements âžž iframe âžž cross-origin-top-navigation-by-user-activation

WEBASSEMBLY

WEBDRIVER

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 29 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 22 September 2025 through Monday, 29 September 2025ðŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +1, -0

Support increases (1)

CSS

  1. css âžž selectors âžž active-view-transition
    Added to Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 8

Show all 8 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (4)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 19 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

CSS

  1. css âžž properties âžž position-area âžž span-left
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines
  2. css âžž properties âžž position-area âžž span-right
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  2 of 3 engines

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions âžž api âžž cookies âžž Cookie âžž expirationDate
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines
  2. webextensions âžž api âžž cookies âžž set âžž expirationDate
    Backfilled for Firefox  âžž  3 of 3 engines

New entries (4)

The entries in this section were not found in BCD on Friday, 19 September 2025, but are now present. These usually do not have any support information attached to them, and often have no corresponding MDN page. Sometimes, entries that appear here also appear in the next section (â€œRemoved BCD entriesâ€) because of a Working Group deciding on a rename.

CSS

  1. css âžž properties âžž position-area âžž span-left
  2. css âžž properties âžž position-area âžž span-right

WEBEXTENSIONS

  1. webextensions âžž api âžž cookies âžž Cookie âžž expirationDate
  2. webextensions âžž api âžž cookies âžž set âžž expirationDate

Removed entries (0)

No features were removed from bcd in this time period

item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 15 September 2025 through Monday, 22 September 2025ðŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +30, -0

Support increases (30)

API

  1. api âžž CSSStyleProperties

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (58)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 12 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

item.title: BCD Changes Report, Mon Sep 15 2025
item.description: Weekly summary of new changes in BCD data
item.content:encoded:
Summary of BCD changes from Monday, 8 September 2025 through Monday, 15 September 2025ðŸ”—

Browser Support Changes: +3, -0

Support increases (3)

API

  1. api âžž Document âžž ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines
  2. api âžž Element âžž ariaNotify
    Added to Chrome  âžž  1 of 3 engines

HTML

  1. html âžž elements âžž input âžž type_color âžž accepts_css_colors
    Added to Firefox  âžž  2 of 3 engines

BCD Metadata Changes: 19

Show all 19 changes

Note: The following represent changes to BCD metadata keys in the reported time period. Keys are not implementations, and they don't represent commitments toward implementation, etc. A new key occurring is perhaps a signal that some implementer was serious enough to add the key. Many of the features that are 'removed' are usually just 'moved' or 'renamed', but we don't have great ways to highlight that.

Backfilled entries (10)

The entries in this section saw support information change since the report on Friday, 5 September 2025, but all the supported browser versions given were more than a couple of months old. Typically, these are cases of support information being updated long after the support actually landed in a browser, but nobody ever updated the BCD entry.

API

  1. api âžž PerformancePaintTiming âžž toJSON
    Backfilled for Chrome  âžž  3 of 3 engines

HTTP
